Job Title: Design Engineer (Highway/Transportation)

Location: Mechanicsburg, PA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Rapidly growing Multidisciplinary, employee-owned Engineering Firm is seeking to hire a Transportation Design Engineer for their office in Mechanicsburg, PA.

This Jobot Job is hosted by: Brian Andres

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button and sending us your resume.

Salary: $80,000 - $110,000 per year

A bit about us:

We are seeking a Design Engineer (Civil-Highway/Transportation) with experience working in a collaborative team environment in our Mechanicsburg, PA office.

Responsibilities

 Executes assignments requiring a basic knowledge of engineering fundamentals and the application of these fundamentals to the production of engineering work as it relates to highway design Executes a variety of engineering tasks in support of project managers and senior engineers including preparation of reports, investigatory studies, engineering design calculations, and layout of roadway and drainage facilities. These tasks may involve collection of data, existing condition and alternative analysis evaluation for engineering reports, development of horizontal and vertical alignments, performing cross section and super elevation design, roadside barrier design, ADA curb ramp design, roadway modeling, and providing design support for erosion and sediment control plans, stormwater management plans, right-of-way plans, utility relocation plans, permit application drawings, and traffic related plans Designs component portions of projects of average complexity when assigned Exercises sound judgment in formulating end products and provides proper details relevant to specific projects Ensures that designs are produced in accordance with client standards and code requirements Is proactive in clarifying directions on project design issues, and proceeds on projects with a clear understanding of time schedule and budget Completes tasks on or before scheduled amount of time and within budget Adheres to scope of work and seeks approval for work outside of scope

Why join us?

 Competitive Base Salary 401(k) Company Match Financial Wellness Generous Paid Time Off Medical/Dental/Vision Short Term and Long Term Disability Accelerated Career Growth!

Job Details

Qualifications

 Candidates shall possess a BS degree in civil engineering or equivalent 2 or more years of relative engineering experience EIT preferred Prior field experience/internship with PennDOT preferred Excellent AutoCAD or MicroStation design skills Proficient verbal and written communication skills, including proposal and report writing

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button. Design Engineer (Highway/Transportation)

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
